byline.contributor: Matt Apuzzo, Michael R. Gordon and Adam Goldman contributed reporting.

lead_paragraph: As he hosts his first foreign leader since taking office, President Trump is contemplating lifting sanctions against Russia despite European objections.
snippet: As he hosts his first foreign leader since taking office, President Trump is contemplating lifting sanctions against Russia despite European objections....

headline.main: Trump Meets Theresa May of Britain as He Weighs Lifting Russia Sanctions
headline.print_headline: Trump to Talk to Putin as U.S. Weighs Lifting Sanctions
